snippet: I.B.M.'s "Jeopardy"-winning computer, Watson, will soon be answering questions on Wall Street. The room-size computer, which can read 200 million pages in three seconds, will help Citigroup identify risks and analyze customer needs, Bloomberg News...
abstract: I.B.M.'s "Jeopardy"-winning computer, Watson, will soon be answering questions on Wall Street. The room-size computer, which can read 200 million pages in three seconds, will help Citigroup identify risks and analyze customer needs, Bloomberg News reports. Read more »

headline.main: Wall Street Welcomes Our New Computer Overlords
